title: Ozone
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm the kind of
Guy who likes feeling
High Feeling  high and dry
And I really like to fly
I'm your kind of  guy, girl
I'm not too shy
And I want you to fly
So I think you ought to try
Ozone, ozone, ozone, ozone
[Verse 2]
I'm your kind of  guy and
I'm not too shy
Feeling  high and
Dry, and I want you to be mine
So I think it's time
Girl, to start feeling fine
Feeling good all the time
So I think you ought to try
Ozone, ozone, ozone, ozone
[Verse 3]
Now I'm the kind of  guy who
Likes getting high
Getting high and dry, and
I do it all the time
If you think it's a crime and
You don't wanna try
Something that'll make you high
Then I think Iâ€™ll say goodbye

[Verse 4]
Because I'm the kind of guy who likes
Getting high
Getting high and dry, and
I do it all the time
Now I'm much too high, I am
High and dry
And I'm feeling  fine, I'm feeling
Good all of the time[?] [to fade]
